mapper.select: select * from history_view where user_no=#{userNo} and regdate between trunc(sysdate, 'MM') and sysdate order by history_no desc
select * from history_view where user_no=#{userNo} and regdate>to_date(${startDate}) and regdate<to_date(${endDate})+1 order by history_no desc
